name: Chachii.com
tag_list: india, chores, job, labor, service-providers, services
overview:
Chachii.com is an Indian company which matches customers with laborers based on location, budget and deadlines.

Semi-skilled labor in metropolitans in India is disorganized. When in need, customers fumble to get in touch with laborers and have them arrive on time, in budget. Chachii.com simplifies this process by algorithmically matching users with service providers.

The number of tasks offered by Chachii.com span a large range of administrative and household needs, and Chachii.com promises to match your need with a service provider within the hour. Currently in its alpha stage, Chachii.com is still in the process of collating its service provider database and conducting user surveys. The beta launch is scheduled for early August in the North Western suburbs on Mumbai.
